title: Rough PC performance can't keep me from loving Wo Long's Wuxia action
description: A 60fps cap and shoddy optimization can't compete with one of the best-feeling counters I've ever seen.

title: Yeah, it's time to replay Elden Ring

title: Police discovered a secret crypto-mining operation beneath a US high school
description: The operation's alleged owner has plead not guilty to charges of fraudulent electricity use and vandalism.
